<u>Ammo 1</u> (Whenever the attached asset attacks or intercepts٫ reduce ~'s ammo by 1 [to a minimum of 0.] Instead of firing an ammo you may treat ~ as if it had ammo 0 until end of turn.)٫ <u>Gun</u> (As long as ~ has ammo remaining٫ the attached asset is ranged.)٫ 
When ~ enters٫ choose an asset to attach it to.
As long as ~ has ammo remaining٫ assets dealt combat damage by the attached asset are removed from the game. 
If ~ would be detached instead remove it from the game.
